Introduction to Submission Intake

\

5 ao — Moh. Py, Qo

) Important note

This presentation is enhanced with audio. Adjust the volume on
your playback device before continuing.

Submission Intake streamlines
submission creation in PolicyCenter
by uploading a PDF file that contains

One or more ACORD forms for
creating submissions.

Describe the Submission Intake process

Upload a PDF file with ACORD forms for a single or multiple lines
View and review the uploaded ACORD forms

Create submissions from the uploaded ACORD forms

Explain creation and data mapping of new lines for Submission Intake

more lines and then review and update the submission data before submitting it to
PolicyCenter.
